name: reset-sizes-extension
description: Reset all size-related changes (UI zoom, editor font zoom, terminal font zoom, and optionally size-related settings) back to defaults.

resetSizes.mode.description: Choose what to reset: 'zoomOnly' resets zoom behaviors only (recommended). 'hardReset' also removes size-related settings (like editor.fontSize) from settings.json, restoring VS Code defaults. Both modes are safe and reversible.
enumDescriptions: Only reset zoom behaviors (UI zoom, editor font zoom, terminal font zoom). Your fontSize settings remain untouched.
Reset zoom behaviors AND remove custom size settings, restoring VS Code defaults. Safe - just cleans up settings.json.

resetSizes.scopes.description: Configuration scopes to apply hard reset (only used in hardReset mode).

resetSizes.includeWindowZoomPerWindow.description: Whether to reset window.zoomPerWindow setting in hard reset mode.

resetSizes.promptBeforeHardReset.description: Show confirmation dialog before removing size settings in hardReset mode. Recommended to keep enabled.

resetSizes.reloadAfter.description: When to reload window after reset: never, prompt user, or always.

resetSizes.showSummaryNotification.description: Show notification with summary of reset actions.
